projects.title: Stage vacature Cape Town Enterprise Zuid Afrika
projects.description:
Be successful in this internship and they can offer you a job at this young fast growing business!
Role of the intern: Human Resources; Entrepreneurs spend 20% of their time sourcing top talent, and we’re after the best of the best. Of course, there’s more than recruitment to delve into, as we look at policy, procedures and how staffing would work for our international expansion. 
Information Technology; From web design, to functionality, we are looking for people to help our existing IT Team provide the best user interface possible and help create an innovative platform that will disrupt the events industry.
Social Media/Marketing & Business Content; Business nowadays is all about content, and we’re looking for talented individuals who can produce and share that content. We’re also looking for people with fresh ideas on market activation. 
Sales; You will be representing the brand professionally, and supporting the sales team by assisting with various projects and objectives. The major goal will be to assist in increasing sales revenue through administrative support of the team and dealing with customer queries.
Multi Media; There is a need for graphic design talent, and are keen to have a positive Corporate Social Responsibility project at the core of our business. 

About Cape Town Enterprise: 
The world is packed with services. But that doesn't make them easy to find. Because they're scattered all over the globe, they're almost impossible to compare. Cape Town Enterprise (CTE) is designed to help you find the services you need, from the suppliers you want, and to make planning and executing an event that people will talk about for years to come. CTE is the only place where you can search, source, review and hire anything and anyone you need for your event. Wherever you are. In fact, why not build the entire thing on your very own dashboard?

profile_positions.description:
Vacature: Stagiaire/vrijwilliger digitale marketing & social media expert bij Let's Go Africa in Nederland.

Ben jij of ken jij een gemotiveerde en getalenteerde Digitale & Social Media Marketing student of vrijwilliger die zich in wilt zetten voor een unieke stage en vrijwilligerswerk organisatie gericht op Afrika? Flexibele uren & werkplek en bijdragen aan duurzame ontwikkelingswerk projecten in verschillende Afrikaanse landen op commissiebasis. Dan is deze vacature bij Let's Go Africa iets voor jou!

Taakomschrijving: 
- Updaten Let's Go Africa website + SEO verbetering
- Google Adwords campagne optimaliseren
- Social media activiteiten opzetten en optimaliseren
- Facebook/Google marketing campagne opzetten
- Benaderen Hogescholen en Universiteiten in NL, België
- Netwerken en werven van geschikte stagiaires, vrijwilligers en reizigers

Vereisten eigenschappen: 
- Digitale marketing achtergrond 
- Kennis van huidige trends en ontwikkelingen in (betaalde) marketing campagnes via FB/Google
- Bestaand netwerk en netwerk skills
- Social media expert
- Ervaring met websites beheren & SEO verbeteren
- Kennis van Google Adwords
- Gemotiveerd, betrouwbaar en innovatief
- Pré; Passie voor reizen/Afrika

Werkplek: flexibel, van huis uit. 
Uren: flexibel en bespreekbaar
Duur: Minimaal 5 maanden bij voorkeur langer
Compensatie: Commissiebasis (oplopend)

Voor meer informatie neem contact op via info@letsgoafrica.nl of met Roel van Hout 0645197822
profile_positions.title: Oprichter zoekt stagiair

profile_positions.description:
Started my own internship/volunteer mediation agency in cooperation with my sister Noor van Hout who is living in Ghana. Let's Go Africa assists students and volunteers in finding reliable projects in Africa in different fields focussing on community development. Our unique personal approach, experience and continuous guidance from begin to end gives people the opportunity to make a change in the lives of local people and in their personal development. 

Currently we offer multiple projects in Ghana, South Africa, Botswana, Mozambique, Swaziland and Lesotho for students and volunteers worldwide. Please contact us if you are interested or you know somebody that might want to go on a life-changing experience with us. 

Check out www.letsgoafrica.nl or email me on roel@letsgoafrica.nl

company.name: Coaching for Hope program of Skillshare International

profile_positions.company: Coaching for Hope program of Skillshare International
profile_positions.description:
Integrated the Canadian Outcome Mapping approach for Coaching for Hope (Sport for development NGO), creating an overview to measure where the partner organizations, coaches & youth stand and how they can be uplifted according to the different progress markers and actions described in the final report.

Recommendation by CFH Cynthia Mangaba:
"Roel van Hout was instrumental in developing a monitoring and evaluation (M&E) frame work for Coaching for Hope (CFH) based on the Canadian Out-Come mapping approach. He developed an easy to use and concise frame work from concept to design, conducting all the necessary research which involved input from implementing partner organisations and CFH staff. The M&E manual he designed is now used by CFH – South Africa for its strategic planning and the basis for developing M&E tools. Mr van Hout proved to be a diligent and focused individual, a self-starter displaying a lot of initiative. He will undoubtedly add value where ever he goes."
